headline: Is Bank of America (BAC) the Most Profitable Value Stock to Buy Now?
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Most Profitable Value Stocks to Buy Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Bank of America Corporation (NYSE:BAC) stands against other profitable value stocks to buy now. Matt Powers, Managing Partner at Powers Advisory Group, joined the discussion on CNBC’s ‘Power Lunch’ […]

headline: Here's What Dip Buyers Bought Amid Last Week's Stock Sell-Off
summary: Dip buyers came out in spades last week, according to client fund flow data from Bank of America.
